title: Lighting the City Smarter with ROLEDS Streetlight Innovation
description:
A recent street lighting project features ROLEDS smart street lighting solutions and low-position street lighting innovations, installed unobtrusively along the bustling city road to provide uniform and visually comfortable illumination for drivers. Smart technology enables remote monitoring and automatic brightness adjustment based on time or weather—maximizing both safety and energy efficiency.

Learn more about ROLEDS smart street lighting solutions: https://global.roleds.com/products/street-lights/

title: Lighting up Yanta AI Innovation & Development Center
description:
Yanta AI Innovation & Development Center - the first and largest AI hub in northwestern China, shining bright with an elegant and futuristic touch.

Located in the historic city of Xi'an, known for its rich cultural heritage, the center stands in striking contrast to the ancient surroundings, delivering an energetic and unforgettable atmosphere with its contemporary design, and dynamic lighting by ROLEDS, thoughtfully crafted to enhance every contour and detail.

title: Jinshan Temple | Ancient Architecture Lighting
description: Jinshan Temple in Zhenjiang, China, with over 1,600 years of history, enters a new chapter through an ambitious lighting project, perfectly complementing its oriental aesthetics. The lighting articulates the stories hidden in the layers of buildings, with warm tones that enhance the site’s spiritual ambiance, transforming it into a stunning landmark for the public.

title: A space where history comes alive— the Danzhou Dongpo Cultural Tourism Center
description:
Step into a space where history comes alive— the Danzhou Dongpo Cultural Tourism Center in Hainan.

The center is built around the historical context of Su Dongpo, one of the most accomplished figures in classical Chinese literature, leaving behind him a prolific collection of poems, lyrics, prose, and essays.

title: Fengxian District, City of Shanghai
description:
Lighting sets the mood, ensuring visibility and safety at the right times.
The street lighting project in Shanghai shows a strong focus on sustainability alongside natural welfare, with ROLEDS energy-efficient LED street lighting luminaires and smart controls to provide the right brightness at the right time. Luminaires with sleek designs blend harmoniously with the surroundings, while neutral white color temperatures create a serene and peaceful atmosphere for pedestrians and drivers alike.
 
Discover more about ROLEDS smart public lighting: https://global.roleds.com/products/#Public-Lighting

title: Stunning bridge lighting with dynamic visual experience
description:
The recently upgraded Danjiangkou Bridge in Hubei, China, is a striking addition to the city skyline. Spanning 1,256 meters, this architectural marvel serves as a pivotal transport link, offering a safe, stunning, and scenic route across the city.

The lighting is an integral aspect of the bridge's architecture, ensuring safety while accentuating its spectacular curve and creating a dynamic visual experience after dark. Roleds floodlights are discreetly placed along the bridge, highlighting the red tone of the surfaces, and wall washers with warm colors cast a golden glow around the curve, adding elegance and depth. At the center, 69 dot light strips form a dynamic façade, with vibrant, color-changing animations that bring the bridge to life at light. 

This combination of functional and landscape lighting transforms the bridge into a symbol of civic pride, offering a dynamic and radiant experience by night.

title: Vivid Lights Meet Tradition: A Park You Must See
description:
When light dances through the trees, illuminates ancient-inspired architecture, and breathes life into sculptures, magic happens.

ROLEDS reimagines nighttime charm of the park with vivid lighting that brings traditional Chinese aesthetics into a modern glow. From glowing rooftops to shimmering squares, every corner tells a story of heritage fused with creativity.

Dive into this visual journey—experience the harmony of culture and light!

title: How Lighting Brings a 600-Year-Old Taoist Palace to Life
description:
Tradition and innovation meet in the Yuxu Palace, one of the largest Taoist palaces nestled within the UNESCO World Heritage site of the Wudang Mountains, with a history spanning over 600 years.
 
The palace complex follows a rigorous symmetrical layout along the central axis, reflecting its grandeur and rich cultural heritage.  ROLEDS lighting fixtures illuminate the exteriors, highlighting the three-dimensionality of the space and the intricate details of its ancient architecture. The lighting evokes a warm, calm, and dignified atmosphere, paying homage to the rich past of the palace.

title: A romantic seaside escape created by modern technology
description: Step into a square transformed by lighting that creates a romantic seaside escape. Carefully designed lights foster a warm, inviting atmosphere, while Gobo projectors cast mesmerizing water ripple effects on the ground.

title: A stunning fusion of elegance and tranquility at the Buddhist Temple
description:
A stunning fusion of elegance and tranquility at the Sarira Pagoda of Longxing Buddhist Temple, one of the tallest pagodas in China, dating from the IX century. 

The present structure, a meticulously rebuilt version on the original site, is a four-sided brick pagoda featuring 17 levels. Its walls are adorned with exquisite bas-relief sculptures of Buddha, and the tower houses 1,080 intricately carved Buddha statues.
 
ROLEDS high-quality lighting enhances the sacred atmosphere, casting a soft, majestic glow that highlights the intricate details of the architecture. The gentle illumination emphasizes the profound artistry of the sculptures and creates a deep sense of reverence.

title: Tunnel Lighting: Safety v.s. Aesthetics
description: Experience exceptional brightness and visual appeal with ROLEDS tunnel lighting solutions. Our cutting-edge technology and customized designs enhance safety and efficiency, transforming every tunnel journey into a brighter and more vibrant experience.

title: Gleaming Glory: A Stunning LED Transformation of an Iconic Building
description:
Sustainability and beauty meet in the Yuanjing Building, one of China’s tallest and most iconic classical-style structures. Originally destroyed by war, this 13-story, 80-meter-tall landmark has been lovingly rebuilt and is now a symbol of resilience and elegance.
 
As part of its modernization, the lighting of the building has been upgraded with ROLEDS energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures and a digital control system, allowing for customizable brightness and enhanced energy savings.
 
After dark, the Yuanjing Building shines with brilliant clarity,  radiating a stunning sense of grandeur.

title: 🚦Smart Road Lighting for Enhanced Safety
description:
ROLEDS low-level smart street light draws inspiration from the streamlined design of the blue whale, featuring sleek lines and a metallic finish. Integrated with an intelligent lighting management system, the light automatically adjusts brightness based on weather sensors and traffic flow, ensuring optimal illumination when needed. 

It offers a "wake-up" lighting mode with a custom blue light spectrum to ease driver fatigue during late-night drives.  In emergencies, an alert system with red signals provides a warning distance of over 100 meters to help prevent secondary accidents. 

Ideal for locations such as overpasses, tunnel entrances, and underpasses, it offers a smart alternative to traditional street lighting solutions.

Jinsha Lake, Hangzhou
description: ROLEDS provides overall solutions for architectural landscape lighting and cultural tourism illumination for Jinshahu, utilizing light technology to create an ideal nighttime living space and build a shining example for the urban landscape of Hangzhou's eastern region.
